version_description:
Added spanish translation.
Note : To follow the Apple guidelines, NFC Tools will no longer be able to read: Chip type, UID, available tech, PMm & System code.

Added spanish translation.
Note : To follow the Apple guidelines, NFC Tools will no longer be able to read: Chip type, UID, available tech, PMm & System code.

Added spanish translation.
Note : To follow the Apple guidelines, NFC Tools will no longer be able to read: Chip type, UID, available tech, PMm & System code.

We work hard to provide you with a quality app, but you may run into problems we couldn't anticipate.
If so, don't panic, keep calm and feel free to contact us.

2.4:
- Added a new record : Search
- Added a new record : Social networks
- Added memory information : Access status (Read-only, writable, ...)
- Improve interface and translations
- Bug fixes

We work hard to provide you with a quality app, but you may run into problems we couldn't anticipate.
